message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.CYBER, cs.CR 

This paper focuses on analyzing the impact of violent events on hate speech on social media platforms, specifically Twitter and Reddit. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the sub-category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) as it involves analyzing language and text data. It also involves social media analysis, which falls under the sub-category of Social and Information Networks (cs.SI). Additionally, the paper discusses the monitoring and fighting of hate speech online, which could fall under the sub-categories of Cybersecurity (cs.CYBER) and Cryptography and Security (cs.CR). Finally, the paper discusses the impact of policy debates on immigration, which could fall under the sub-category of Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HCI).
